That's a great idea! Waze Carpool can be a fantastic way to reduce traffic congestion and make your commute more efficient.

When it comes to finding a carpool buddy, it's generally recommended to find someone who's traveling in the same general direction, rather than necessarily to the exact same office building. Here's why:

**Benefits of carpooling with someone heading in the same general direction:**

1. **More matches**: You'll have a larger pool of potential carpool buddies to choose from, as you're not limiting yourself to people going to the exact same office building.
2. **More flexibility**: Even if your carpool buddy isn't going to the exact same office building, you can still drop them off at a nearby location or a common intersection, making it more convenient for both of you.
3. **Reduced traffic congestion**: By carpooling with someone heading in the same general direction, you'll still be reducing the number of cars on the road, which can help alleviate traffic congestion.

**That being said**, if you can find a carpool buddy who's traveling to the same office building, that's even better! You can coordinate with them to arrive at the office at the same time, making it a more convenient and hassle-free experience.

To increase your chances of finding a compatible carpool buddy, make sure to:

1. **Set your route and schedule accurately**: Make sure your Waze Carpool profile reflects your exact route and schedule, so you can find someone who's traveling at the same time and in the same direction.
2. **Be flexible**: Be open to adjusting your schedule or route slightly to accommodate a carpool buddy, if needed.
3. **Communicate clearly**: Clearly communicate with your carpool buddy about your schedule, route, and any other important details to ensure a smooth commute.

Remember, Waze Carpool is a great way to reduce traffic congestion, save money, and meet new people. Good luck, and I hope you find a great carpool buddy!
